short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Saves students time by automatically submiting their library sign in forms.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When students sing in to library, with L-Pass all students need to do in scan their school ID and go instead of clicking multiple buttons(submit etc.).

I made this extension for my school (West High School) but anyone who have the same problem can use it.
